hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT log FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.queriablelogger.model.impl.SQueriableLogImpl AS log WHERE log.numericIndex1 = :numericIndex1

SELECT log FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.queriablelogger.model.impl.SQueriableLogImpl AS log WHERE log.numericIndex3 = :numericIndex3
SELECT log FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.queriablelogger.model.impl.SQueriableLogImpl AS log WHERE log.numericIndex4 = :numericIndex4
SELECT log FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.queriablelogger.model.impl.SQueriableLogImpl AS log WHERE log.numericIndex5 = :numericIndex5
